name: Twitch Giveaway Wheel
description:
Made w/ Godot 3.

Instructions:

- GENERAL/FOLLOWERS ONLY giveaway:

1. Input your username (ALL LOWERCASE) into the first box with placeholder "Enter your username..."

2. Press the SPIN button

- If you would like to give subs a 2X chance, do the following:

1. Uncheck the "FOLLOWERS ONLY" box

2. Go to this link to request your subbed users as a text file: https://tike14531453.github.io/twitchsubdatagetter/

!!!IMPORTANT!!!

DO NOT SHOW SUB GETTER PAGE ON STREAM AS SUBSCRIBER NAMES ARE VISIBLE!

3. Copy and paste the text in the file into the "PASTE SUBSCRIBER DATA HERE..." box

4. You can also uncheck "HIDE SUBSCRIBER DATA" to double check what you have pasted

A FEW KEY THINGS:

  • NO DATA used is saved on my end. Only YOU will have access to the data pulled!
  • The data will only reflect at the time it was pulled, meaning if someone isn't currently viewing, they will NOT be participating
  • Subscriber names will ONLY be included if they are VIEWING (extension of previous note)
